Name: Mandacaru
About the game: Mandacaru is a game where you'll have to think fast to match the seeds and crops. Inspired by brazilian northeast culture, the crops represent the most iconics fruits or vegetables in our culture, Features Brazilian northeast inspired looks and music! Hypercasual focused on speed, while making you think about your next steps Cute pixel-art Infinite replayability This game was subsidized by SEBRAE via a notice to promote the creative economy. Social media Follow us on our social media: Instagram: @mandacarugame Twitter: @mandacarugame
